page.title: 12USE OF BUILDINGS.
page.content: There are few buildings in the bottom 4kilometre squares of our grid.These are{Bodstone Barton-}Farm with grass land supporting sheep.{Bodstone Lodge- Private residence{.Higher Yetland-} Farm,grassland with sheep, horses and some holiday accomodation.{Wheel {Cottage-}Self catering cottages with land for touring caravans.{Wheel Farm- Guest House and restaurant.{ {Henstridge-}Farm with grassland supporting sheep and beef cattle. {Thornland-}House with land for caravans,holiday accomodation and shooting range.{Indicknowle-}Kennels and Cattery with grassland and woods. {Yellaton- }Private residence.
